entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 6:59 PM PST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 in the morning then becoming southeast 20 in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:59 PM PST Thursday 09 March 2023
